name: Ant Farm +
description:
Control your ants, Build your farm. Its a sandbox game with ants.   plusplusgames.com

  • Ants move towards your cursor
  • Dig Tunnels with Right Click
  • When build mode is toggled, Build With Left Click
  • When  move mode is toggled, Move while holding Left Click
  • When Prod mode is toggled, Prod Ants lol
  • Press K to regenerate a new world
